usage: Use for in page navigation on deeper pages where the options may need more explanation as at this level you are getting into more finer detail.
Use for in page navigation on landing pages, or where there are a lot of options that you want to bring into a single page view
Use on pages where users have to go a few levels deep to find what they need. This will allow them to get back to higher level pages incase they went into the wrong section.
